Paul's words to Timothy are spoken to every young man who desires to enter the ministry: "Take heed to thyself and to the doctrine." "Thyself" needs the first attention. Trim the lamp of the soul, and 


                                     -124- 

replenish it with the oil of the Spirit. Seek from Christ that grace, that clearness of comprehension, that will enable you to do successful work. Learn from Him what it means to labor for those for whom He gave His life. The most talented worker can do little unless Christ is formed within, the hope and strength of the life. In order for the life to produce good fruit, the root must be holy.
